typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	secretSurvey as string ('azure-sql-dev-survey'),
	secretCustomer as string ('azure-sql-dev-masterdata'),
	secretEDS as string ('azure-sql-dev-eds'),
	tableSurvey as string ('vwADF_GDMPhotoTaking'),
	tableCustomer as string ('vwADF_Customers'),
	tableEDS as string ('EDS_GDMPhotoTransaction')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SurveyTransaction
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Customers
SurveyTransaction, Customers join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinToCustomer
JoinToCustomer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkToData
